  • Constructor Details

    • meteor_fixing_state

      public meteor_fixing_state(Card cardO, Card_State oldState, Player playerC, FlightBoard fb, ArrayList<ArrayList<SpaceShipTile>> subSHIPS) throws Exception
      Constructor for the meteor_fixing_state class. This method initializes the state required for the scenario where a player fixes a meteor impact. It sets up necessary resources, associates the player, and configures game-related entities such as the card and subship blocks.
      Parameters:
      cardO - The card object related to the current meteor fixing state.
      oldState - The previous state of the card before transitioning to this state.
      playerC - The player interacting with the meteor fixing state.
      fb - The flight board instance representing the game's current state.
      subSHIPS - A 2D list of spaceship tiles representing the subships affected by the meteor.
      Throws:
      Exception - Throws an exception if an error occurs during initialization.

  • Method Details

    • chooseOneSubShip

      public void chooseOneSubShip(int index, int playerID) throws Exception
      Allows a player to select one sub-ship from the available blocks and removes the other blocks not chosen. Updates the game state and notifies the event bus accordingly. Ensures the player making the selection is valid and that the chosen index is within the allowable range.
      Overrides:
      chooseOneSubShip in class Card_State
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the sub-ship block to be chosen
      playerID - the unique identifier of the player making the selection
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during the removal of blocks or notification to the event bus
